body_html:
The whl files provided by Google and installed using pip also have the mentioned dependence on a minimum version of glibc. Specially, the following external version symbols must be provided by system provided shared libraries:

GLIBC_2.14
CXXABI_1.3.5
GCC_3.0
GLIBCXX_3.4.19

I can try to add information about this dependency to the conda packages, although I will probably wait until the next release.

GLIBC_2.14

body:
The whl files provided by Google and installed using pip also have the mentioned dependence on a minimum version of glibc.  Specially, the following external version symbols must be provided by system provided shared libraries:

```
GLIBC_2.14
CXXABI_1.3.5
GCC_3.0
GLIBCXX_3.4.19
```

I can try to add information about this dependency to the conda packages, although I will probably wait until the next release.
